title: A famine looms in Gaza
description: As Israel continues to wage its military campaign against Hamas, we break down why it has blocked humanitarian aid — including food — into Gaza. Hunger and disease now threaten hundreds of thousands of people in Gaza.

title: With Rwanda deportation bill, U.K. evades human rights norms it established
description: The House of Commons has passed migration legislation that departs from international human rights obligations the U.K. helped to write.

title: Elon Musk to attend event near Auschwitz death camp, Jewish group says
description: The tech billionaire also is scheduled to take part in a discussion with conservative media personality Ben Shapiro amid blowback over antisemitism on Musk’s X platform.

title: Fighting in central Gaza rages on amid hostage families’ growing doubts
description: The fierce fighting, especially in central Gaza, suggested that Israel forces were not yet fully scaling back their assault despite U.S. pressures over heavy civilian casualties.

title: The Crown broke a promise to First Nations. It could now owe billions.
description: In 1850, Indigenous groups ceded much of what’s now Northern Ontario for a promise that any riches from the land would be shared with them. They’re still waiting.

title: Pakistan fires retaliatory strikes at Iran, risking new regional conflict
description: The strikes came amid an increasingly restive situation in the Middle East that has also strained relations between the nuclear-armed Pakistan and its neighbor.

title: Former flight attendant to become first woman to lead Japan Airlines
description: Mitsuko Tottori, 59, said safety would be her priority. She praised the flight crew that evacuated a planeload of people during a fiery accident this month.

title: Israel-Gaza war live updates: Pakistan says it struck targets in Iran; U.S. hits Houthi sites in Yemen
description: The retaliatory attack comes two days after Iran struck what it said were enemy targets inside Pakistan and marks a new front in the upheaval rocking the Middle East.
